mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_ID, FILE_PATH, ORIGN_FILE_NAME, CHANGE_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, REGIST_USER_NAME, REGIST_DATE, DEL_YN ) VALUES ( #{fileId}, #{filePath}, #{orignFileName}, #{changeFileName}, #{fileSize}, #{registUserName}, sysdate(), 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_ID, FILE_PATH, ORIGN_FILE_NAME, CHANGE_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE FILE_ID = #{fileId}
SELECT /* org.mt.mms.cmm.mapper.CommonMapper.selectTopContrNms : 원계약ID, 명 조회 */ TOP_CONTR_ID, TOP_CONTR_NM FROM TOP_CONTR WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
SELECT /* org.mt.mms.cmm.mapper.CommonMapper.selectCompNms : 업체ID, 명 조회 */ COMP_ID, COMP_NM FROM COMP WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
